description:
Our team at Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC, is dedicated to preserving the innocence, rights and freedoms of our clients. No matter what criminal charges our clients face in Washington, D.C., they know our law office is prepared to fight for them. We also bring the same level of dedication and enthusiasm to protect our clients' best interests in civil litigation cases.

Why hire an attorney

Public defenders have the best interests of their clients at heart and sometimes bring years of experience to the table. However, they often do not have the resources necessary to give each case the attention it deserves. An experienced law office does.

During civil litigation, parties to the case need to hire an attorney to get access to legal services. Doing so from the early stages gives an attorney time to review the case, piece the incident back together and build a strong case.

Why choose Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC
Our team is licensed to practice within the Washington, D.C., area, Virginia and Maryland. We have represented clients in a wide range of cases:

  • Family law
  • Entertainment law
  • Trucking accident
  • DUI/DWI
  • Real estate
  • Tax law
Our wide range of practice areas is complemented by a diverse team that speaks Spanish, Punjabi, Hindi, Urdu and Korean. The first consultation with our law office is free.
